page.title: 03AIR DEFENCE LOSSIEMOUTH
page.content: Eight squadrons are currently based at Lossiemouth. Six are aircraft based, three squadrons of Buccaneers, one of Shackletons, one squadron of Jaguars and last but not least the Air Sea Search and Rescue squadron. The other two squadrons are ground defence based. One Rapier missile squadron and one of the few voluntary squadrons in the R.A.F. {Jaguar}pilots are trained at R.A.F. Lossiemouth. In battle the Jaguar is a backup to the army. The{Shackleton's}main occupation is the Airborne Early Warning system. The{Buccaneer's}main aim is to cripple ships and submarines by bombing their radar and weaponry. The{Hunter}is used for training Buccaneer pilots.
